summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TerraQuest sustainability tracker app. All backend APIs working correctly with 100% success rate. Frontend functionality fully operational including user registration/login, product scanning, dashboard stats, navigation, leaderboard, challenges, and rewards system.
passed_tests: User registration with name, email, password
User login with email and password
Dashboard displaying user EcoScore, level, total scans, and average sustainability
Dashboard showing recent scans and mini leaderboard (top 5)
Product scanning via barcode input and dropdown selection
Scan result showing product details: name, brand, sustainability score, carbon footprint, recyclability, ethical score
EcoScore and level updates after scanning products
Full leaderboard page showing top 10 users ranked by EcoScore
Challenges page displaying eco challenges with requirements and rewards
Rewards page showing redeemable rewards with NGO partners
Reward redemption validation based on user's EcoScore (buttons disabled for insufficient points)
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Scan, Leaderboard, Challenges, Rewards)
Mock data initialization (8 products with barcodes 1001-1008, 3 challenges, 4 rewards)
User level progression system (Eco Rookie → Green Explorer → Eco Guardian → Sustainability Champion → Green Legend)
Real-time EcoScore updates after product scans
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (12/12 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (19/19 core features working)
